mapper.insert: insert into ecs_package_goods (package_id, goods_id, admin_id, product_id, goods_number) values (#{package_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admin_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{product_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goods_number,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.select: select package_id, goods_id, admin_id, product_id, goods_number from ecs_package_goods
